text: “Iwo kulibe, anthu a Nuh adakaniranso pamodzi ndi makamu a anthu omwe adali kuda aneneri, m’badwo wa Nuh utatha; ndipo m’badwo uliwonse udaikira mtima kuchita choipa pa mneneri wawo kuti am’gwire (ndi kumupha). Adali kutsutsana poteteza chachabe kuti ndi uwo (mtsutso wawowo) achotse choona. Ndipo ndidawaononga kotheratu. Tayang’ana, chidali bwanji chilango Changa (pa iwo)
